name: Billy Adventure
description:
Billy Adventure

Puzzle video game about robot-machine, Billy, and his adventure in today's harsh world.

Features:

  • Control your robot by cards
  • Find artefacts

Controls:

  • Mouse to pick cards
  • Q/E to rotate camera

Programs Used:

  • Unreal Engine 5.0
  • Blender
  • Adobe illustrator

System Requirements:

  • Windows 10 with support for DirectX 12 Agility SDK
  • DirectX 12 (With Shader Model 6.6 atomics)
  • Latest Graphics Drivers
